function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Increase in non-performing loans and bankruptcies due to businesses closing and households losing income","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Difficulty in maintaining social distancing and following lockdown rules while conducting banking activities","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential resurgence of covid-19 due to relaxation of restrictions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Concerns over reduced demand in the early stages of normalization","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Citizens under 20 likely to carry the virus without symptoms and infect others","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Concerns about psychological and emotional wellbeing of restricted individuals","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emotional, psychological, sociological consequences and serious economic implications","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Restriction of public places and businesses","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Restriction of movement for elderly and high-risk individuals","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Imposition of curfew and fines for non-compliance ","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on deposit banking and food service industries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strategic uncertainty and severe financial distress for firms","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid spread of covid-19 in the built environment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of vaccination availability","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Difficulty in implementing new ways of interaction","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate adaptation of services to the new normal","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increasing use of face masks and sanitizers may lead to environmental pollution and waste management issues.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Remote services and virtual try-ons may lead to a decrease in in-store foot traffic, impacting physical retailers and the local economy.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of technology for shelf monitoring and clean surfaces may lead to data privacy and cybersecurity risks.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unprecedented transmissibility and variety in symptoms of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Little prospect of widely available vaccine and second global outbreak","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of masks and mask production can contribute to environmental waste and pollution","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid production and adoption of new mask technologies may lead to quality and safety issues","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promotion of reusable masks may lead to improper maintenance and cleaning, increasing the risk of disease transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long-term effects on consumer psyche from pandemic","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reluctance to engage in consumer research during pandemic","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Littering of masks and gloves in public spaces","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mandatory mask wearing creating high demand","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global supply chain vulnerabilities","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of coffee yarn and silver nanotechnology in the face mask","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Antimicrobial face mask becoming a potential source of viral transmission if not handled properly","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential skepticism towards the performance of the eco-friendly face mask","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate decomposition of the coffee face mask after being discarded","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of ineffective protection against air particulate matter","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collection of used coffee from various sources may introduce contamination and pathogens into the production process.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Importing materials from different locations increases the risk of introducing foreign pathogens and contaminants into the manufacturing process.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High demand and production volume may lead to insufficient monitoring of hygiene and cleanliness in the production process, increasing the risk of contamination and spread of contagious diseases through the shoes.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Production and distribution of face masks during a contagious disease outbreak","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Air pollution and its impact on public health","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High percentage of consumers adopting new behaviors and habits due to covid-19.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"New habits and behaviors adopted during covid-19 crisis likely to persist.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of face masks as a result of air quality concerns and the covid-19 pandemic.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of research on green brand equity in the context of covid-19 post-pandemic","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Innovative products and marketing strategies in response to covid-19","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Customers underestimating the risk of contagion due to strong brand loyalty and trust","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate risk assessment and management of contagion in brand experience environments","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overemphasis on customer experience and brand image leading to negligence of contagion risk","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increase in greenwashing leading to consumer skepticism about brand promises to preserve the environment","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mistrust leading to decreased engagement in the long run","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Asymmetry of information in the marketplace","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"}]}
